title: Friday Feast with PA & Charch!
description: The first hour full of talkers and then HOF'er Bill Polian joins for great NFL conversation, Chad Greenway's weekly appearance, Jonny Athletic joined at 11 to highlight a great piece he wrote on Glen Taylor's ownership of the Wolves, Russo eulogizes the Wild and MORE!
itunes:summary: The first hour full of talkers and then HOF'er Bill Polian joins for great NFL conversation, Chad Greenway's weekly appearance, Jonny Athletic joined at 11 to highlight a great piece he wrote on Glen Taylor's ownership of the Wolves, Russo eulogizes the Wild and MORE!
